PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: Brukerinnstillinger
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AVATAR_DELETE_FAILED: There is an error while deleting avatar, please try again
PROFILE_SETTINGS.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your profile has been updated successfully
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: Din profil har blitt oppdatert, vennligst logg inn igjen ettersom din innloggingsinformasjon er endret

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: Profil
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: Din e-postadresse er din identitet og brukes til å logge inn.

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: Hotkey to send messages
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: You can select a hotkey (either Enter or Cmd/Ctrl+Enter) based on your preference of writing.
SEND_MESSAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your settings have been updated successfully

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Enter key instead of clicking the send button.

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Cmd/Ctrl + enter key instead of clicking the send button.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Personal message signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: Create a personal message signature that would be added to all the messages you send from your email inbox. Use the rich content editor to create a highly personalised signature.

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: Message Signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: Insert your personal message signature here.

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: Passord
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: Oppdatering av passordet ditt nullstiller logger deg ut på andre enheter.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Tilgangstoken
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: Dette tokenet kan brukes hvis du lager en API-basert integrasjon

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Audio Notifications
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Enable audio notifications in dashboard for new messages and conversations.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Alert conditions:
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: Send audio alerts only if the browser window is not active
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: Send alerts every 30s until all the assigned conversations are read

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: E-postvarsler
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Send e-postvarsler når en samtale er tildelt meg
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Send e-postvarsler når en ny samtale opprettes
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send varsel på e-post når du er nevnt i en samtale
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send e-postvarsler når en ny melding opprettes i en tilordnet samtale
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send email notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation

API.UPDATE_ERROR: Det oppstod en feil under oppdatering av innstillingene. Prøv igjen

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Pushvarsler
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Send push-varsler når en samtale er tildelt meg
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Send push-varsler når en ny samtale opprettes
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send pushvarslinger når du er nevnt i en samtale
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push-varsler når en ny melding opprettes i en tilordnet samtale
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: Du har aktivert push-varsler for denne nettleseren.

DISPLAY_NAME.LABEL: Visningsnavn
DISPLAY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Skriv inn et visningsnavn, dette vil bli vist i samtaler

AVAILABILITY.LABEL: Tilgjengelighet
AVAILABILITY.SET_AVAILABILITY_ERROR: Couldn't set availability, please try again

EMAIL.LABEL: Din e-postadresse
EMAIL.ERROR: Vennligst skriv inn en gyldig e-postadresse
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Vennligst skriv inn din e-postadresse, dette vises i samtaler

PASSWORD.LABEL: New password
PASSWORD.ERROR: Skriv inn et passord som er 6 eller flere tegn langt

PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.LABEL: Bekreft nytt passord
PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.ERROR: Det bekreftende passordet burde samsvare med passordet

SIDEBAR_ITEMS.SELECTOR_SUBTITLE: Velg en konto fra følgende liste

ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.TITLE: Account Suspended
ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.MESSAGE: Your account is suspended. Please reach out to the support team for more information.

FILE_BUBBLE.INSTAGRAM_STORY_UNAVAILABLE: This story is no longer available.

SIDEBAR.FACEBOOK_REAUTHORIZE: Facebook-tilkoblingen din er utløpt, koble til Facebook-siden din for å fortsette tjenester

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_TEXT: Let the system automatically mark you offline when you aren't using the app or dashboard.

BILLING_SETTINGS.TITLE: Billing

CURRENT_PLAN.TITLE: Current Plan
CURRENT_PLAN.PLAN_NOTE: You are currently subscribed to the **%{plan}** plan with **%{quantity}** licenses

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Manage your subscription
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: View your previous invoices, edit your billing details, or cancel your subscription.

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: Need help?
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: Do you face any issues in billing? We are here to help.

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: Your billing account is being configured. Please refresh the page and try again.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: Uh oh! We could not find any Chatwoot accounts. Please create a new account to continue.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Kunne ikke koble til Woot Server, vennligst prøv igjen senere

TITLE.MOVE_TO_NEXT_TAB: Move to next tab in conversation list
TITLE.SWITCH_CONVERSATION_STATUS: Switch to the next conversation status
